mapper.select: select * from carttable where clothestable_id=#{gid} and usertable_id=#{uid}
mapper.update: update carttable set shoppingnum=shoppingnum+#{shoppingnum} where usertable_id=#{uid} and clothestable_id=#{gid}
mapper.select: select clothest.id, clothest.clothesname, clothest.clothespicture, clothest.clothesrprice, ct.shoppingnum, ct.shoppingnum*clothest.clothesrprice smallsum from CLOTHESTABLE clothest, CARTTABLE ct where clothest.id=ct.clothestable_id and ct.usertable_id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from carttable where usertable_id=#{uid} and clothestable_id=#{gid}
